√svan 'sound'

present: [1.] svanati  svanate etc.   -- asvanīt  

perfect: sasvāna  sasvanus E.+  svenus  

aorist: [1.] sváni?   -- [3.] asisvanat   -- [5.] svānīt  

[future: svaniṣyati  svanitā  ]

verbal: svanita  

secondary: intensive: saniṣvanat  saṅsvan-   -- desiderative: sisvaniṣa-   -- causative: svanayati etc.  

derivatives: -svan  svaná V.+  svāná V.+  svānín RV.  -svanas RV.  sváni RV.  svanáya RV.
